The part where it’s supposed to look like you’re wearing a short sleeve shirt and a long sleeve shirt it just doesn’t  look like that. Looks like just two colors put together. Not really worth the money.
I got the size it recommended but I advise to go down one and it would probably still be loose. Also the material is a dry fit like material but it's alright and I don't regret buying it.
